Keyterm: I - Model KM, 2 PCLM, Approved April 26, 1938.

Level flight or climb - 100 mph True Ind. 
 Glide or dive -- 135 mph True Ind.
KM-1 and up manufactured prior to 12-11-42 eligible. Approval expired as of that date.

Keyterm:
II - Model 50-M, 2 PCLM, Approved October 19, 1938. 
 (Same as model KM except for wide cabin. No structural changes.)

 Glide or dive -- 135 mph True Ind.
M-1018 and up manufactured prior to 12-11-42 eligible. Approval expired as of that date.
